description: Initiates a stop request for the current test run. AWS Device Farm immediately stops the run on devices where tests have not started. You are not billed for these devices. On devices where tests have started executing, setup suite and teardown suite tests run to completion on those devices. You are billed for setup, teardown, and any tests that were in progress or already completed.

parameters.name: arn
parameters.description: Represents the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Device Farm run to stop.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The run's ARN.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The run's name.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The run's type.
BUILTIN_FUZZ.
APPIUM_JAVA_JUNIT.
APPIUM_JAVA_TESTNG.
APPIUM_PYTHON.
APPIUM_NODE.
APPIUM_RUBY.
APPIUM_WEB_JAVA_JUNIT.
APPIUM_WEB_JAVA_TESTNG.
APPIUM_WEB_PYTHON.
APPIUM_WEB_NODE.
APPIUM_WEB_RUBY.
INSTRUMENTATION.
XCTEST.
XCTEST_UI.

nested_items.name: platform
nested_items.description: The run's platform.
ANDROID.
IOS.

nested_items.name: created
nested_items.description: When the run was created.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The run's status.
PENDING.
PENDING_CONCURRENCY.
PENDING_DEVICE.
PROCESSING.
SCHEDULING.
PREPARING.
RUNNING.
COMPLETED.
STOPPING.

nested_items.name: result
nested_items.description: The run's result.
PENDING.
PASSED.
WARNED.
FAILED.
SKIPPED.
ERRORED.
STOPPED.

nested_items.name: started
nested_items.description: The run's start time.

nested_items.name: stopped
nested_items.description: The run's stop time.

nested_items.name: total
nested_items.description: The total number of entities.

nested_items.name: passed
nested_items.description: The number of passed entities.

nested_items.name: failed
nested_items.description: The number of failed entities.

nested_items.name: warned
nested_items.description: The number of warned entities.

nested_items.name: errored
nested_items.description: The number of errored entities.

nested_items.name: stopped
nested_items.description: The number of stopped entities.

nested_items.name: skipped
nested_items.description: The number of skipped entities.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: A message about the run's result.

nested_items.name: totalJobs
nested_items.description: The total number of jobs for the run.

nested_items.name: completedJobs
nested_items.description: The total number of completed jobs.

nested_items.name: billingMethod
nested_items.description: Specifies the billing method for a test run: metered or unmetered. If the parameter is not specified, the default value is metered.

nested_items.name: deviceMinutes
nested_items.description: Represents the total (metered or unmetered) minutes used by the test run.

nested_items.name: total
nested_items.description: When specified, represents the total minutes used by the resource to run tests.

nested_items.name: metered
nested_items.description: When specified, represents only the sum of metered minutes used by the resource to run tests.

nested_items.name: unmetered
nested_items.description: When specified, represents only the sum of unmetered minutes used by the resource to run tests.

nested_items.name: networkProfile
nested_items.description: The network profile being used for a test run.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the network profile.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the network profile.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the network profile.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of network profile. Valid values are listed here.

nested_items.name: uplinkBandwidthBits
nested_items.description: The data throughput rate in bits per second, as an integer from 0 to 104857600.

nested_items.name: downlinkBandwidthBits
nested_items.description: The data throughput rate in bits per second, as an integer from 0 to 104857600.

nested_items.name: uplinkDelayMs
nested_items.description: Delay time for all packets to destination in milliseconds as an integer from 0 to 2000.

nested_items.name: downlinkDelayMs
nested_items.description: Delay time for all packets to destination in milliseconds as an integer from 0 to 2000.

nested_items.name: uplinkJitterMs
nested_items.description: Time variation in the delay of received packets in milliseconds as an integer from 0 to 2000.

nested_items.name: downlinkJitterMs
nested_items.description: Time variation in the delay of received packets in milliseconds as an integer from 0 to 2000.

nested_items.name: uplinkLossPercent
nested_items.description: Proportion of transmitted packets that fail to arrive from 0 to 100 percent.

nested_items.name: downlinkLossPercent
nested_items.description: Proportion of received packets that fail to arrive from 0 to 100 percent.

nested_items.name: deviceProxy
nested_items.description: The device proxy configured for the devices in the run.

nested_items.name: host
nested_items.description: Hostname or IPv4 address of the proxy.

nested_items.name: port
nested_items.description: The port number on which the http/s proxy is listening.

nested_items.name: parsingResultUrl
nested_items.description: Read-only URL for an object in an S3 bucket where you can get the parsing results of the test package. If the test package doesn't parse, the reason why it doesn't parse appears in the file that this URL points to.

nested_items.name: resultCode
nested_items.description: Supporting field for the result field. Set only if result is SKIPPED. PARSING_FAILED if the result is skipped because of test package parsing failure.

nested_items.name: seed
nested_items.description: For fuzz tests, this is a seed to use for randomizing the UI fuzz test. Using the same seed value between tests ensures identical event sequences.

nested_items.name: appUpload
nested_items.description: An app to upload or that has been uploaded.

nested_items.name: eventCount
nested_items.description: For fuzz tests, this is the number of events, between 1 and 10000, that the UI fuzz test should perform.

nested_items.name: jobTimeoutMinutes
nested_items.description: The number of minutes the job executes before it times out.

nested_items.name: devicePoolArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the device pool for the run.

nested_items.name: locale
nested_items.description: Information about the locale that is used for the run.

nested_items.name: wifi
nested_items.description: True if Wi-Fi is enabled at the beginning of the test. Otherwise, false.

nested_items.name: bluetooth
nested_items.description: True if Bluetooth is enabled at the beginning of the test. Otherwise, false.

nested_items.name: nfc
nested_items.description: True if NFC is enabled at the beginning of the test. Otherwise, false.

nested_items.name: gps
nested_items.description: True if GPS is enabled at the beginning of the test. Otherwise, false.

nested_items.name: latitude
nested_items.description: The latitude.

nested_items.name: longitude
nested_items.description: The longitude.

nested_items.name: customerArtifactPaths
nested_items.description: Output CustomerArtifactPaths object for the test run.

nested_items.name: iosPaths
nested_items.description: Comma-separated list of paths on the iOS device where the artifacts generated by the customer's tests are pulled from.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: androidPaths
nested_items.description: Comma-separated list of paths on the Android device where the artifacts generated by the customer's tests are pulled from.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: deviceHostPaths
nested_items.description: Comma-separated list of paths in the test execution environment where the artifacts generated by the customer's tests are pulled from.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: webUrl
nested_items.description: The Device Farm console URL for the recording of the run.

nested_items.name: skipAppResign
nested_items.description: When set to true, for private devices, Device Farm does not sign your app again. For public devices, Device Farm always signs your apps again.

nested_items.name: testSpecArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the YAML-formatted test specification for the run.

nested_items.name: deviceSelectionResult
nested_items.description: The results of a device filter used to select the devices for a test run.

nested_items.name: filters
nested_items.description: The filters in a device selection result.

nested_items.name: attribute
nested_items.description: The aspect of a device such as platform or model used as the selection criteria in a device filter.

nested_items.name: operator
nested_items.description: Specifies how Device Farm compares the filter's attribute to the value. See the attribute descriptions.

nested_items.name: values
nested_items.description: An array of one or more filter values used in a device filter.
The IN and NOT_IN operators can take a values array that has more than one element.
The other operators require an array with a single element.

nested_items.name: matchedDevicesCount
nested_items.description: The number of devices that matched the device filter selection criteria.

nested_items.name: maxDevices
nested_items.description: The maximum number of devices to be selected by a device filter and included in a test run.

nested_items.name: vpcConfig
nested_items.description: The VPC security groups and subnets that are attached to a project.

nested_items.name: securityGroupIds
nested_items.description: An array of one or more security groups IDs in your Amazon VPC.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: subnetIds
nested_items.description: An array of one or more subnet IDs in your Amazon VPC.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: vpcId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon VPC.
